A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi is amazing! Everytime I thought I knew what was going the happen\, Rian Johnson spins it around and kept me at the edge of my seat. Some moments did lack the excitement I would have hoped for but what I wanted to see compared to how it all came together is very miniscule. Overall this movie is a must see. Don't look at the negative that some reviews say\, just go in with an open mind and let the force be with you.
